text.text:
I visited this church for the first time after the renovation. I previously visited in 2019. The ambience and decor in the church is beautiful. It has received a major lift although it was quite a good church before the renovations.
I quite like the choir that played at the 6:15 mass.
Participation by parishioners was seen.
I had a wonderful experience. What I observed is that mass frequency is more than it is at some other parishes, so the people density for each mass is less (this is actually a good thing) which means there is plenty of place to sit even if you come five minutes before mass.
The confession room was also occupied continuously so a priests were always available. Also a good thing.
I definitely will be going back here and if you are around this area, I recommend going to this church.

text.text:
A peaceful and historic church with a strong spiritual presence. The Church of Our Lady of Lourdes stands out with its beautiful Gothic-style architecture and tall spire, creating a serene and inviting atmosphere.

Inside, the church offers a quiet and reflective space for prayer, with well-maintained interiors and a welcoming community. It is a significant place for the Tamil Catholic community, with Masses held in multiple languages.

Whether you're here for worship, history, or simply seeking a moment of peace, this church provides a meaningful and calming experience in the city.

Whether you're here for worship, history, or simply seeking a moment of peace, this church provides a meaningful and calming experience in the city.

text.text: Finally this Chruch has finished its renovation... Recommended to go on weekdays as weekends will be filled with parishioners and tend to be crowded.

originalText.text: Finally this Chruch has finished its renovation... Recommended to go on weekdays as weekends will be filled with parishioners and tend to be crowded.

text.text: We always go to this church. Except when they had a few years renovation. Now the renovation is completed and it is now very convenient. The aircon is high on the ceiling so the cold air is not right on our head, the multimedia is good too, they have monitors strategically overhead so we can read easily. They also have camera and we can see clearly the pastor. We especially like the mass because they use modern English version of the songs, so we can understand and easily sing along. The choir is good too.

text.text:
Beautiful renovated Church since 1888.

Serenely abounds the Urban City District
with tranquillity, healing, and worshipping.
